text.author: Nelson Mandela
text.summary: In a letter to Sir de Villiers Graaff, Nelson Mandela expresses concern over the Verwoerd Government's plan to establish a Republic without the consent of the non-white majority in South Africa, and proposes a National Convention to create a new constitution, calling on Graaff to support this initiative.
